prompts: Create a fierce fire-type Pokemon with a fiery tail and sharp claws.
I want a bipedal Pokemon that has orange scales and can breathe fire.
Generate a Pokemon design that features a dragon-like shape and glowing embers.
Make a dynamic fire-type creature that has a playful personality and orange hues.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek body, vibrant colors, and a flame motif.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both charm and ferocity with its striking appearance.
Show me a fiery creature with a confident stance and a unique tail design.
